products.title: PUMA DARE TO Women's Relaxed Woven Pants
products.description: Dare to be different with these DARE TO woven pants, a fashion piece that embodies confidence, boldness and the celebration of your individuality. Designed for women with a passion for style and determination, these pants combine design with an inspiring message: dare to be yourself.
products.model: DARE TO Women's Relaxed Woven Pants

products.title: Uniqlo Smart Ankle Pants (Ultra Stretch)
products.description: Ultra Stretch fabric. | Roomy around the inseam for a comfortable fit. | Elegant fabric and a sleek ankle-length cut. | Snap buttons and an elasticated waistband for a comfortable fit.

products.title: Uniqlo Drapey Denim Pleated Pants
products.description: Incredibly soft denim made from a lyocell and cotton blend. | Stylish pleats at the front. | Elastic waist at the back for easy outfit changes. | Full-length, wide-leg straight cut. | BLUE CYCLE JEANS technology reduces the volume of water* used in the finishing process. Water savings may vary between products

products.title: PUMA x PALOMO T7 Pants
products.description: Founded in 2015, Palomo Spain is known for designs that combine the dramatic spirit of southern Spain with the sophisticated street style of London.
